EmailTemplate.name: Calling No Contact Day 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Trying to Get in Contact
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Looks like we missed each other again. When is a better time that we can set up a call?
You can reach me right now or until 8pm EST at 877-252-9728.
Thanks again. I look forward to speaking with you!
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | {!User.Title} RapidAdvanceÂ®
1001 Woodward Ave, Suite 1700 | Detroit, MI | 48226 Email:{!User.Email} | Website: www.RapidAdvance.com
